WRITING.TITLE: Even as an adult I still get harassed and bullied by others
WRITING.TEXT: Why the fuck shouldn't I kill myself? I can't live in the same world as these assholes.

WRITING.TITLE: There's no escape
WRITING.TEXT: I want to go out with friends and do something but I don't even have any fucking friends and can't make any. I don't want to work. I don't want to live in a world where a small group of people fucking dictate my life. Life isn't fucking worth living so there's no reason for me to not blow my brains out
Probably because it's fake bullshit

WRITING.TITLE: I should just end it
WRITING.TEXT: I want to go out with friends and do something but I don't even have any fucking friends and can't make any. I don't want to work. I don't want to live in a world where a small group of people fucking dictate my life. Life isn't fucking worth living so there's no reason for me to not blow my brains out

WRITING.TITLE: Why is it so fucking hard to eat healthier and workout consistently?
WRITING.TEXT: I have practically zero self confidence. And one of the things that keeps me down is I don't like my body. I'm not fat, but parts of me are just so out of shape that I hate even looking at it. All I want is to get into better shape but I never stay consistent with improving this shit.

WRITING.TITLE: I don't know how many more Friday nights I can take without going out...
WRITING.TEXT: Every Friday/Saturday I just want to go out and do something with someone. But I don't have any friends to do anything with. Every weekend that I stay at home, it just makes me want to stick a gun in my mouth more and more. Edit: Why do people come here just to downvote people? What the fuck is wrong with you?
Yup. After doing that for years now, I don't even enjoy games that much anymore. Burned out. Yet I still force myself to play because there's just nothing else to do.

WRITING.TITLE: I've been suicidal for over two years now and STILL no one has been able to convince me that life is worth living
WRITING.TEXT: Really says something. Everyone knows it's bullshit but won't admit it.

WRITING.TITLE: There's a carnival happening nearby for the Fourth of July and just driving by it crushed me
WRITING.TEXT: I want to go to it so bad. I never go out anywhere and carnivals are always fun... but I have literally no one to go with. All I saw when I passed by were groups of friends and people on dates. I just want to be happy for once and enjoy something. But I can't.

WRITING.TITLE: I can't cope with having no friends any longer
WRITING.TEXT: I just want it to end already. Life isn't worth living like this.
Jokes on you then, I don't want to work hard. Death it is.

WRITING.TITLE: There's nothing anyone can say to get rid of my depression
WRITING.TEXT: So what is the point of talking about it? Whenever I talk about it with someone, nothing changes. I'm still severely depressed and want to kill myself.
There's no excuse for not understanding depression. We live in the age of the internet. They can research it and have millions of sources at their fingertips.
You don't even know a thing about me..
I've tried everything.

WRITING.TITLE: No motivation to do what I used to love
WRITING.TEXT: Which is creating stories. Severely depressed and can't even think straight, which is required for crafting a fucking plot. I don't even know the best way to tell the story. A book? Movie? Comic book? I don't fucking know. I just can't think and I can't even force myself to work on anything anymore. Just put a .50 caliber bullet between my eyes.

WRITING.TITLE: There isn't a single thing keeping me alive at this point
WRITING.TEXT: Unless you count me being too afraid to actually put a bullet in my head. Any passion or motivation I had for the things I liked to do is completely gone now. No friends. No girlfriend. Dog has been dead for a year now and I actually don't know where the fuck the last year has gone. And I hate living in this shit world full of shit people. If that bullet would instantly kill me and it was 100% lethal, I'd be more inclined to do it.

WRITING.TITLE: I can't make friends
WRITING.TEXT: I can't live in social isolation much longer. Everyday it feels like I'm getting closer to taking my life.
Fuck off with this shit.
Guilt tripping me and then you say this shit. Yeah, fuck you.
I do want asshole. How is guilt tripping someone helping them? All it does is make them feel worse.
No I don't. So go fuck yourself. gt;Suicide will just pass your pain onto someone else Fuck off
I don't have any energy or willpower to change anymore. So there's no point in suffering anymore

WRITING.TITLE: One year of progress from therapy isn't shit
WRITING.TEXT: Trying to treat my crippling social anxiety. 12 months have now gone by. All I'm able to do now that I wasn't able to do before is shop at stores and pay at the cashier myself. 12 months... and that's all there is. I need a fucking job but I can't even have a fucking conversation with someone. No friends either. What's even the point of doing this if progress is so slow? I've been out of school for 2 years and still never had a job before.

I don't have anymore time left. Everyday of being isolated and not having a single friend makes me want to kill myself. I don't even know what a right therapist is supposed to be like. I've only ever had the one.

WRITING.TITLE: Fade to Black
WRITING.TEXT: If there is any song that perfectly describes what I'm feeling through it's lyrics (while still being a great sounding song), it would be this one. Life, it seems, will fade away Drifting further every day Getting lost within myself Nothing matters, no one else I have lost the will to live Simply nothing more to give There is nothing more for me Need the end to set me free Things not what they used to be Missing one inside of me Deathly lost, this can't be real Cannot stand this hell I feel Emptiness is filling me To the point of agony Growing darkness taking dawn I was me, but now he's gone No one but me can save myself, but it's too late Now I can't think, think why I should even try Yesterday seems as though it never existed Death greets me warm, now I will just say goodbye

WRITING.TITLE: Life is not worth living if there's nothing to enjoy
WRITING.TEXT: Fuck anyone who says otherwise

WRITING.TITLE: Who here has gone to group therapy?
WRITING.TEXT: Particularly for social anxiety

WRITING.TITLE: Who here has gone to group therapy for social anxiety?
WRITING.TEXT: What is it like? How many people? Did it help? Make any friends?

WRITING.TITLE: There's literally no point in me being alive if I'm unable to work towards anything
WRITING.TEXT: Working at a job? I'd rather blow my brains out. Practice guitar or writing? Rather hang myself. Workout and get in better shape? Prefer to jump into a pool of acid. There's just no point.
What a load of bullshit

WRITING.TITLE: Has anyone's depression gotten so bad that they not only have suicidal thoughts, but homicidal ones as well?
WRITING.TEXT: Every time I get angry now, at the world or whatever, I think about killing someone that deserves it before killing myself. Seems like such a waste to just kill myself and not do something that can make some kind of a positive difference to the world.
People like them deserve to be fucking killed. Goddamn this world.

Lack of interest or motivation in doing the things I used to love. Used to write and craft stories, but I haven't done that in over a year now. Which is crazy since I used to work on a story every single day.
.22 would more than likely result in you surviving, with extensive brain damage. Main reason why I don't really think about using a gun on myself.
Because they don't bother to really think about it

WRITING.TITLE: I want to cry every time I see an attractive girl now
WRITING.TEXT: If I had a gun with one bullet and were locked in a room with Hitler, Stalin, and social anxiety somehow in a physical form, I'd shoot social anxiety and then beat the shit out of it's corpse. Being alone is not fun and I don't know how anyone can justify it. Human beings are not meant to live life alone.
Of course this is true. But how are you supposed to do that if you have like zero social skills?
Damn thanks lol. Means a lot
I need to have some level of confidence in myself first though. And I have none. Even though I've had girls interested in me in the past.

Thanks. A lot of my depression stems from the fact that I'm alone though. Really the only thing that could make a big ass dent in my depression is having at least one person that I can hang out with. Being alone has literally been killing me for years now.
I don't have social skills, so I don't even know what words to utter. Even if I figure that one out, I'd have no idea what to do after a short exchange with someone. The conversation would just die.
I'd need to actually like looking at myself in the mirror.

I've found a few meetups around me, but most of them is people that are in their 40's or older. Big age gap. Even the board game ones don't look very good. I'm close to giving up on meetups. Thinking about joining group therapy for social anxiety. Idk what I'm gonna do if that doesn't work out.

I live next to a big city in the US. Idk why the meetups aren't very good here. Been using Meetup.com. I feel like the meetups that look decent enough to join is still too scary. Group therapy seems like a better first step. Gain some confidence after doing that. Maybe make a friend.
What do you mean by "don't set your standards too high"?
I don't believe in leagues. They don't really exist.
No shit looks and personality matter. Where did I say they didn't?

WRITING.TITLE: Why can I not force myself to talk to strangers?
WRITING.TEXT: All I want is some people in my life, but I need to talk to people in order for that to happen. But no matter how hard I try, I can't fucking force myself to speak to someone. I seriously have no idea why I can't even say something simple like "nice day out" or whatever.
I can't argue with you there. Damn good reply that got me thinking.
I've been in therapy for a year now. Really haven't made much progress... I can walk into stores by myself and checkout with a cashier now, but starting a conversation with someone? Nope.
I was diagnosed with social anxiety so you're right.

WRITING.TITLE: Why can I not force myself to talk to strangers?
WRITING.TEXT: All I want is some people in my life, but I need to talk to people in order for that to happen. But no matter how hard I try, I can't fucking force myself to speak to someone. I seriously have no idea why I can't even say something simple like "nice day out" or whatever. I fucking hate social anxiety.
But I'm depressed *because* I'm alone.
Every self help book I've come across talks about things I've heard about hundreds of times already. Haven't found one that really stands out.
Fade to Black by Metallica. Every part of it is just perfect.
Who's the author?

WRITING.TITLE: Is there any way to help keep homicidal thoughts away without distractions?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm tired of distracting myself. Everyday of my life is literally nothing but distractions from depression, suicidal and now homicidal thoughts. Tired of it.
I already have one. Doesn't help. Edit: Just an FYI, I'm not like the guy below me. Could never be cruel to an animal.

I do see a therapist. Afraid to even bring up anything involving these thoughts. I mean, even talking about my suicidal thoughts doesn't do much. I know why I have these feelings, but they're still there.
Because people tend to freak out about that kind of thing these days. Especially if you're into firearms as a hobby. People just instantly think you're going to shoot up a school now.
Wtf? Go fuck yourself. Edit: This is EXACTLY why I haven't said anything to my therapist.
I just don't want my life to be fucked anymore than it already is. Same reason I've never called the suicide hotline. Because some dumbass might overreact and call the police to come take me away.

And it's not like I'm a danger to anyone. My suicidal thoughts are 100 times worse and I'm still not a danger to myself, even though I wish I was. And I don't want to kill innocent people, I don't have those thoughts.
What if he had succeeded? You'd just be singing a different tune?

WRITING.TITLE: I hate people and society and just want to end it
WRITING.TEXT: What's the point in being alive in such an ignorant and hateful world? It's fucking hopeless and should honestly just end. I can't cope with living in the same world as these people. I just fucking can't. Doesn't matter if I could have a small group of friends that think like me, there's still billions of dumb and hateful people inhabiting the planet.

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone here with social anxiety able to successfully fake being confident?
WRITING.TEXT: I just can't seem to fake it no matter how hard I try. How do you do it?

WRITING.TITLE: How are you supposed to fake confidence?
WRITING.TEXT: Is anyone here been successful with doing this?

WRITING.TITLE: As technology advances, people are becoming more ignorant and apathetic
WRITING.TEXT: And there's no way I can cope with living in such a horrible reality. Why bother continuing on?
I can't even remember what life was like before all of this bullshit. Which is fucked up because that's only like 10 years ago.
.22 is a very weak caliber. Chances of survival is incredibly high.
That's an amazing way to put it.

I seriously cannot comprehend why people these days can't be okay with differing opinions. If you disagree with, agree to disagree. Or have a calm debate. It's not fucking hard and yet people can't do that anymore. Everyone is just so hateful.
Been divided for the past 6 years at least and it sure as fuck doesn't look like it's improving at all. We'd get so much done if we could just be united for once.
*Others* aren't okay with different opinions.
1. Why should I censor myself because others are intolerant assholes? 2. I didn't downvote you, so thank you for the assumption.
Fuck no. Cancer is anything but peaceful.
Doesn't mean it has to be illegal

WRITING.TITLE: Are there any places to go to when you don't have any friends?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm so sick of being at home. It's been a prison of mine for four years now and I just to need escape. All I want to do is go out somewhere and have some fun... but I don't have single friend to do that with. Are there even places that you can go to by yourself?
I'll be 21 early next year so bar is out of the question. But I also have social anxiety so doing anything with people (especially groups) is difficult.
Illinois

WRITING.TITLE: How do you stop getting angry at the tiniest of things?
WRITING.TEXT: Simply losing a game is enough to send me into a fucking rage. How do I fucking stop it?

WRITING.TITLE: I want to go out and get out of the house but I have nowhere to go
WRITING.TEXT: There's absolutely nothing to fucking do when you have no friends. I can't fucking take this shit anymore. Just fucking kill me for fucks sake.
Women like her should be in jail for the rest of their lives. Absolute fucking monsters.
I don't even know how to fucking make friends. Can't even go to places without having any problems like a normal person because I have severe social anxiety.
Depression doesn't lie about everything.

WRITING.TITLE: How do you love yourself?
WRITING.TEXT: People are always saying you have to love yourself, and that it attracts more people to you. But how the hell do you do it? I don't hate myself, but I just can't love myself.
When I'm having a depressive episode, most of the time I'm thinking of how horrible this world is. Society is a joke. So many people are cruel, intentionally or unintentionally. That's not a lie.
I can't cope with the thought that most humans suck, even when there's a minority of good ones.

gt; Not makeup, but just putting more effort into my clothing. No more plain baggy black everything, but colours and more fitted clothes. I've been trying to find clothes for the past month now and can't even find anything that I'd like. I don't know anything about fashion. And I know for sure that some nice new clothes would help me at least a little..
I don't get it. I won't feel anxiety if I stay comfortable at home (even if it hurts long term).

WRITING.TITLE: For those with social anxiety, what do you do to challenge yourself everyday?
WRITING.TEXT: I've noticed recently that I don't challenge my anxiety as much as I should. I don't really know what I can do everyday. I go to the store as often as I can, but that's at most 3 times a week. It's not good when I miss a day of exposure, I start to feel a bit like crap the following day.
Huh. It's not like that for me. But I do feel guilt if I stay home or fail at challenging myself, and then get more depressed.
Yeah... I can't even picture myself doing that, even though I want to.

I used to be deathly afraid of going into stores and using a cashier, but that's okay now. Not even close to being as bad as before. But now my anxiety is at its worst when trying to talk to people or make small talk. I'm just unable to do it.

Drinking bleach is like straight up drinking fire. Burns and dissolves your esophagus and stomach. And surviving that, and the surgery the doctors do to save you, is fucking horrifying. I wish there was a button to push that would just end my existence without any pain.
What kind of books do you like? I used to read but it's so difficult to do now because of depression, of course.
I tested hanging myself a year ago. Felt the pain in my neck for the rest of the day. Hurts more than people think.
It's a sick joke no matter where you live.
Well if this isn't the realist shit I've read...

WRITING.TITLE: It's never worth living with depression
WRITING.TEXT: If there's no way for me to get rid of feeling like this more often than not, then fuck anyone who tries to stop me from ending my life.

WRITING.TITLE: I was feeling great and energetic this morning and now I'm depressed and suicidal as fuck
WRITING.TEXT: Why? I can't even fight the fucking thoughts. I've been trying for four fucking hours straight and nothing is working. It's not worth being alive with this fucking bullshit.

WRITING.TITLE: I was feeling great and energetic this morning and now I'm depressed and suicidal as fuck
WRITING.TEXT: Why? I can't even fight the fucking thoughts. I've been trying for four fucking hours straight and nothing is working. It's not worth being alive with this fucking bullshit.
I'm not even a feminine kind of guy at all. I'm just not overly masculine
Yeah, I recognize that at least. But I'm just unable to cope with the fact that people like me are a small minority
I am in the US but I honestly don't think it would matter where I lived. People seem to think sexism is okay when it's against a guy.
I don't wear women's clothes...

WRITING.TITLE: Being depressed and trying to get in better shape is impossible for me
WRITING.TEXT: I don't know how anyone can fucking do this. It's too fucking hard to eat healthy on a regular basis and cut out drinks that have sugar in them. I use it to cope rather than drugs and alcohol, and it continues to kill my self confidence because I don't like my body. Skinny with fat in all the wrong places. Never going to have the confidence in myself if it doesn't fucking go away. Just put a bullet in me.
Guy
Well I'm not comfortable in my own skin. I can't even walk around comfortably and it takes me forever to pick out clothes because none of them ever fit well. Plus I'm only 20.
These comments are such fucking shit. Of course no mods are around.
gt;Just stay on the internet Where people are even worse and show their true colors because of anonymity.
The only thing preventing me from doing that as well is the thought of surviving. Or dying, but surviving long enough to be in excruciating pain for hours on end.
Yeah, that's the problem. I can't cope with living in the shitty present, so I'd rather just be dead.
Because every other country is shit in its own way.
The problem is I have no way of changing anything. The world is going to remain a pile of shit that I'm forced to live in.
Ed, Edd n Eddy and Malcolm in the Middle are the two shows from my childhood that will never fail to at least put a small smile on my face.
It's both.
I want to kill myself if I have to work a 9-5 job. I'm a human being. I'm not supposed to be locked in a building 8 hours every fucking day doing something I hate.

WRITING.TITLE: Never thought I'd start hurting myself
WRITING.TEXT: I've been starting to bite my arms or fingers whenever I get angry. I'm afraid it's going to become a habit. I've done it at least 10 times today. I don't know how to stop.
